channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
[code]- Project Czar - .. Online! Connection accepted from 95.141.28.53: 3265. Connection accepted from 95.141.28.53: 3280. BANNING HOST 95.141.28.53 (flooding)[/code]
Im using allstarscape ssource (yes i know shitty) and i added an anti null but yet im stilll getting nulled... After 2 connections of flooding it will ban the ip, after that nothing else will be said in my server prompt but my server will appear offline on status and for me and other players even though it's online.
Can someone kindly point me in the direction of how would i add an "anti-null" or can you just spoon feed me the code? I see one allstar server that has full anti null and they never get crashed. I need this please!

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Find other means of protection from flooding.

Read full topic
